summary: Makes the fins of Elven Arrows glow so you can find them easier.
descriptionHtml:
Makes the fins (fletchings) of Elven Arrows glow so you can find them easier.  There are two versions - one with glowing fins, and one with both glowing fins and an aura.  See the images.

This is a mesh and texture replacer; there is no ESP, so load order is not an issue. Any other mod that replaces the Elven Arrow meshes will conflict with this mod, though probably not catastrophically. Whichever mod you installed (not loaded, INSTALLED) last will win.

There is now a version with a glowing aura as well.

INSTALLATION

Either use NMM, or just extract to your Skyrim folder.

REMOVAL

Use NMM.  You can also just delete the files.

SIMILAR

I\'ve done several similar mods:
Daedric Arrows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42792/?
Nordic Arrows from Dragonborn: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43433/?
Dragonbone Arrows from Dawnguard: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43497/?
Nordic Dragonbone Arrows from AeonVita\'s Dragonbone Weapons mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43087/?

Search on \"gizmologist\" and you\'ll find others, too.
author: Gizmologist
